content: भागिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भाग-इनि] {@--1@} Consisting of shares or parts. {@--2@} Sharing, having a share. {@--3@} Sharing or participating in, partaking of; as in दुःख°. {@--4@} Concerned in, affected by. {@--5@} A possessor, owner; <ls>Ms. 9. 53.</ls> {@--6@} Entitled to a share; <ls>Ms. 9. 165</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 125.</ls> {@--7@} Lucky, fortunate. {@--8@} Inferior, secondary. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A coheir. --नी A coheiress.
